commits.sourceNew: /** * Initialize metrics specific to this producer. * @param parentContext parent metrics context. If this component has the same life-cycle as the parent * it can simply use the parent context, otherwise it should obtain a child context * using {@link SolrMetricsContext#getChildContext(Object)} passing this * as the child object. * @param scope component scope */ void initializeMetrics(SolrMetricsContext parentContext, String scope);
